oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Organic Centre Wales Factsheet 2: Information on the relationship between the Organic Farming Scheme and Tir Gofal
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Anon,
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Environmental aspects
Education, extension and communication
Values, standards and certification
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This factsheet provides information on the relationship between the Organic Farming Scheme and Tir Gofal. Issues covered are; entering land into both schemes, payments, underlying principles of the schemes and arable farming.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Anon, (2006) Organic Centre Wales Factsheet 2: Information on the relationship between the Organic Farming Scheme and Tir Gofal. Organic Centre Wales.
